generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: (1) QOOLA - Wearable Air Conditioner with Ion Purifier (2) Temperature from 15C to 45C (3)Negative air ion removes contaminants (4) comfort and fresh air

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: busy parents
generations.text: Introducing the Qoola wearable air conditioner – the perfect way to keep cool and comfortable during the hot summer months. This innovative device features an ion purifier that removes contaminants from the air, providing you and your family with fresh and healthy air to breathe. The temperature can be set from 15C to 45C, making it perfect for any climate.

Audience: Office workers
generations.text: QOOLA is the perfect solution to keeping you cool and comfortable in the summer, and warm and cozy in the winter! It's a wearable air conditioner with an ion purifier that removes contaminants, so you can breathe easy. Plus, the temperature range is from 15C to 45C, so you can adjust it to your liking.

generations.text: Introducing the QOOLA, the wearable air conditioner that keeps you cool and comfortable all day long. With temperature settings from 15C to 45C, the QOOLA is perfect for summer or winter. And the negative air ion purifier removes contaminants for fresh, clean air. So stay cool and comfortable all day long with the QOOLA.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: Office workers
generations.text: Looking for a way to stay cool and comfortable all day long, without cranking up the AC? Look no further than the QOOLA wearable air conditioner! This innovative device provides a refreshing blast of cool air whenever you need it, and also purifies the air around you with negative ions. So you can enjoy the benefits of both summer and winter air all year round!

Whether you're looking to beat the heat in the summer or simply want to enjoy some fresh air in the winter, the QOOLA is perfect for you!
